official_title: A bill to provide for at-large appointment of the Federal Reserve Chairman.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to permit the at-large appointment of the Chairman of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.

titles.title: A bill to provide for at-large appointment of the Federal Reserve Chairman.
